description.p: Performs Unicode Normalization on all XML members of a fileset.
This is a useful process to perform prior to executing sorting, searching or other string-based comparisons on an XML file.
Supports all four normalization forms defined by the Unicode Consortium, with the default being NFC, as suggested by the W3C Character Model for the World Wide Web.
For more information on character models and normalization, see: http://www.w3.org/TR/charmod-norm/
